string.text: I heard you need help?
I don't have a job for you yet, come back later.
No, not yet. Come back later.
The job's already sorted out. Try to be quicker next time.
Yes, so listen carefully...
None
I'll come back next time then...
Ok
Alright
So, how's it going, stalker? How's your health?
Well, show me what you got.
Greetings, stalker! As the saying goes "Those who are about to die, WE salute you!"
Got something need fixing? Bring it over here and we'll sort it out!
How is your health? Do you need some medicine?
Well hello young man, what brings you here? Have you come with good news or bad news? Or maybe you came with gifts, eh?
Well hello...
Greetings, what brings you here?
Hi. What do you do here?

Hello stalker, the modern gladiator! Do you wish to earn money? You may fight for it here. If you win, honor and praise will be bestown upon you! And if you lose, eternal disgrace you shall have! And don't forget, you'll earn a reward you deserve. Don't you worry about that...
Got it, I'll keep it in mind.
Hi. What do you do here?
Hello, the name's Nitro. Nice to meet you. I'm the technician around here. If you need anything, you know where to find me.
Got it, I'll keep it in mind.
Hi. What do you do here?

Well hello, I'm Heal. I can help you out with any illness you might have. And if you need some healing, don't be afraid to ask! I got first-aid kits, bandages, pills... I think you know what I mean. Duty has a good amount of supplies, so if you need anything, we'll get it for you.
Got it, I'll keep that in mind.
What do you do here?
None
None
May I ask you something?
There's a mechanic here, his name is Nitro. He can make some amazing stuff. He needs more parts and tools though...

Well, there are a couple of places here. Like the "100 Rads" bar, or the Arena. This place is just somewhere you can take a break from all the crap that's going on around the Zone. An oasis, that's what I'd call this place...
Nothing much, a safe piece of land in the midst of hell on earth.
I see, thanks.
Where can I make money here?
Barkeep is always looking for someone. I think you should go talk to him. He even puts out an ad on the radio.
Go talk to Barkeep, ask him for a job.
I heard Nitro was looking for someone to help him. Go ask him.
I don't know. Go ask someone else, maybe they'll know...
Sure, ask away.
Of course, I'm listening.
Look, I don't have time to talk... Leave me alone...
Okay, I'll leave you to it.
Are there any interesting places around here?
You could say you're in the middle of everything that's interesting! There's the bar, security's working all around, it's just awesome!
If you get irradiated or just need some medicine, go visit Heal. ќн в здании слева от бара после ангара обитает. He's a pretty handy guy.

I think so, you can go to Kalgan's arena and sign up for a fight if you're confident. Or you can just watch stalkers beat up each other. Sometimes those matches get so brutal, they give you nightmares for weeks...
